title: The Accidental Anarchist: A humorous (and true) account of a Polish Jew who was sentenced to death 3 times -- and survived.
description: The Accidental Anarchist is the true story of Jacob Marateck, a Polish Jew who was sentenced to death three times in the early 1900s in Russia (and lived to tell about it.) That was when he decided to overthrow the Czar.
author: Bryna Kranzler
